crow.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a large shiny black bird with a loud cry
crow.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the loud sound a cock makes
crow.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: if a cock crows, it makes a loud high sound
crow.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to talk about what you have done in a very proud way â€“ used to show disapproval
crow.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: He was crowing over winning the bet.
crow.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: if someone, especially a baby, crows, they make a noise that shows they are happy
crow.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: Ben rushed to his father, crowing with pleasure.
